
``my_arowMeans``
====================

my_arowMeans

Description
-----------

arithmic rowMeans that works for a single column

Usage
-----

.. code-block:: r

   my_arowMeans(x)
   my_arowMeans(x)

Arguments
---------

.. list-table::
   :header-rows: 1

   * - Argument
     - Description
   * - ``x``
     - data to use
